_info.description: two types of information that need to be identified are chat and error

chat.msg: Hello, how can I assist you?

chat_sayagain.msg: sorry, I didn't understand. Can you repeat that?

chat_saymore.msg: please tell me more details for your database

error.msg: I'm sorry, I'm not able to help you with that

err_llm.msg: can not connect to LLM server

err_cursor.msg: can not execute the SQL in database
